title: Fluorescent probes for investigating the internalisation and action of bioorthogonal ruthenium catalysts within Gram-positive bacteria
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00187G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nicole Schubert, James W. Southwell, Melissa Vázquez-Hernández, Svenja Wortmann, Sylvia Schloeglmann, Anne-Kathrin Duhme-Klair, Patrick Nuernberger, Julia E. Bandow, Nils Metzler-Nolte
The bioorthogonal, intracellular Ru-catalyzed deprotection reaction of coumarin dyes is studied inside Gram-positive bacteria.
